page.title: 08FARM MACHINERY
page.content:
There are five people that have a farm, three have animals and crops, the other two have just crops. Nobody has a farm with just animals.
There is one fork-lift truck, two combine harvesters, one caterpillar tractor, two tractors, two bailers, two elevators, one grass cutter and one potato digger.
Crops such as barley, corn, wheat and oil seed rape are grown. Some fields are full of grass which are cut down and used to make hay. The bailer is used to make hay into bails. The potato digger is used to dig up potatoes because the fields are so big that it would take a long time to pull up the potatoes by hand.
